code: import React,{Fragment,useState}from'react';import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{toast}from'react-toastify';import'./Login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=_ref=>{let{setAuth}=_ref;const[inputs,setInputs]=useState({email:"",password:""});const{email,password}=inputs;const onChange=e=>{setInputs({...inputs,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const onSubmitForm=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const body={email,password};const response=await fetch("http://localhost:5000/auth/login",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(body)});const parseRes=await response.json();if(parseRes.jwtToken){localStorage.setItem("token",parseRes.jwtToken);setAuth(true);toast.success("login successfully");}else{toast.error(parseRes);}}catch(err){console.error(err.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-center",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:onSubmitForm,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"email",children:"Email address"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",name:"email",placeholder:"Enter email",className:"form-control",value:email,onChange:e=>onChange(e)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"password",children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",name:"password",placeholder:"Password",className:"form-control",value:password,onChange:e=>onChange(e)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Submit"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/register",className:"link",children:"Register"})]})})});};export default Login;
